item.title: Analyze Investment Strategies
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial, we will learn how to analyze a naive fixed investment strategy for Bitcoin. If you don’t know what is Bitcoin, I suggest you learn some fundamentals about cryptology, computer networking, and distributed systems. You may find this introduction helpful. Any comments here about investing are scams. This is only a technical tutorial. I will assume you already have some basic knowledge of Python, which is a great tool for analyzing data.
